chunk_0.text: Sophie Moreau 24 Rue de Rivoli Paris, 75004, France +33 6 12 34 56 78 sophiemoreau@email.com  Objective: Motivated and detail-oriented human resources professional with a strong foundation in recruitment, employee relations, and HR administration. Eager to leverage my skills and passion for people in a new HR role at StIT, where I can contribute to the success of the team and the company.  Skills:  1. Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, both written and verbal, in French and English. 2. Strong organizational, multitasking, and problem-solving abilities. 3. Familiarity with HR management software (Workday, BambooHR) and Microsoft Office Suite. 4. Knowledge of French labor laws and HR best practices. 5. Experience in full-cycle recruitment and onboarding processes. Experience in full-cycle recruitment and onboarding processes.

chunk_1.text: Experience in full-cycle recruitment and onboarding processes. Experience in full-cycle recruitment and onboarding processes. 6. Self-motivated, goal-oriented, and able to work in a fast-paced environment.  Education: Master of Science (MSc) in Human Resources Management ESCP Business School, Paris, France Graduated: June 2021  Work Experience: HR Assistant StIT, Paris, France September 2021 - Present  1. Assist in the full-cycle recruitment process, including sourcing, screening, and interviewing candidates. 2. Collaborate with hiring managers to identify staffing needs and develop job descriptions. 3. Support the onboarding and offboarding processes, ensuring a smooth transition for new and departing employees. 4. Assist in the administration of HR policies, procedures, and employee records. 5. Contribute to the development and implementation of HR initiatives and projects. Contribute to the development and implementation of HR initiatives and projects.
